question: You want to hold a surprise party for a friend who is visiting his home town after a long time from a foreign country. Write a letter to a common friend asking for his help in organizing the party and in your letter:•	Write the reasons for organizing the party•	Describe when, where and how you would be organizing the party•	Ask your friend to meet you in person for further discussionsYou do not need to write any addresses.
text: I hope you are doing well and I am writing this letter to let you know that our best friend Puja is returning from Canada to her home back after a long time period, so, I am very glad to know that we could meet her again. Along with this, I want to express my happiness and excitement by organizing a surprise party for her, in which, I need your help.

Consequently, the party will be next week Monday at my house, So that, we have to complete entire tasks like decorations ,gifts and food before her arrival. Moreover, You will manage the music and seating arrangements  for guests.
In addition, I want you to visit my place as soon as possible for further discussions like what type of gift should we present her and we have to prepare a dance performance for this party.
I would be grateful if you could help me with this.
